content: Let’s be clear. In the administrations mind, it’s worse to kill 70 Syrians than over 6million Jews, gays, communists, gypsies, unionists, and any who supported them. This is the argument. ‘Hitler was bad, but he wasn’t this bad’. And there are actually people making an argument that The administration is hard done by in this circumstance. They think killing 70 people is worse than killing over 6million!!!!!!
